review.title: “Best Place to work, sharpen skills to add value chain”
review.pros: Pros – Here is few key reasons to work at KDK Software (I) Pvt1. Company is well on its way to meet its goal.2. Good Employee Relations and Fair Treatment3. Fair Chances for Internal Promotion Prospects4. Good Support, Training and Learning/Development Environment5. Benefits and Incentives6. Flexibility of Working Hours
review.cons: Cons – Growth in company is based on knowledge for startersCampany has a very few people available to deal with all the red tapeCompetition is high
